content: When you've beaten the five carts and cracked through the ice to get into the cave, you're not quite yet in the Bishui Cave realm. To do this, you need to step toward the center of the room. However, if you take a left first and go to the open zone, you can find another of the frog bosses
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secrets_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 5 Secrets', specifically from the subsection 'Baw-Lang-Lang'.
The content is as follows:
When you've beaten the five carts and cracked through the ice to get into the cave, you're not quite yet in the Bishui Cave realm. To do this, you need to step toward the center of the room. However, if you take a left first and go to the open zone, you can find another of the frog bosses
